articles.title: Please stop worrying about Angular 3
articles.author: jessjelly
articles.body: Another Angular version planned already? Whaaaat? Didn’t Angular 2 just ship? Why Angular 3? What? Why? First off, there is no massive rewrite, and won’t be for Angular 3. Secondly, let me explain the future of Angular 2 and what Angular 3, Angular 4 will mean for you.
